S03n224:7: syādeva rūkṣamanasāmapi ca prasādo dharmyāḥ kathāśca ramaṇīyataratvamīyuḥ ||2 ||
S03n224:9: lokottamasya caritātiśayapradeśaiḥ svaṃ prātibhaṃ gamayituṃ śrutivallabhatvam ||3 ||
S03n224:11: sarvajña ityavitathākṣaradīptakīrti mūrdhnā name tamasamaṃ sahadharmasaṃgham ||4 ||
S03n224:13: sarvasattveṣvakāraṇaparamavatsalasvabhāvaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtaḥ pūrvajanmasvapi sa bhagavāniti buddhe bhagavati paraḥ prasādaḥ kāryaḥ ||
S03n224:15: bodhisattvaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavānbhūtaḥ pratijñātiśayasadṛśairdānapriyavacanārthacaryāprabhṛtibhiḥ prajñāparigrahaniravadyaiḥ kārūṇyanisyandairlokamanugṛhṇan svadharmābhiratyupanataśucivṛttinyuditodite mahati brāhmaṇakule janmaparigrahaṃ cakāra |
S03n224:16: sa kṛtasaṃskārakramo jātakarmādibhirabhivardhamānaḥ prakṛtimedhāvitvātsānāthyaviśeṣājjñānakautūhalādakausīdyācca nacireṇaivāṣṭādaśasu vidyāsthāneṣu svakulakramāviruddhāsu ca sakalāsu kalāsvācāryakaṃ padamavāpa |
S03n224:17: sa brahmavad brahmavidāṃ babhūva rājeva rājñāṃ bahumānapātram |
S03n224:29: asaṃstutasyāpi janasya loke so'bhūt priyastasya yathaiva lokaḥ ||9 ||
S03n224:35: maitryādike caiva manaḥsamādhau yathābalaṃ so'nuśaśāsa śiṣyān ||12 ||
S03n224:36: atha kadācitsa mahātmā pariniṣpannabhūyiṣṭhe pṛthūbhūte śiṣyagaṇe pratiṣṭhāpite'sminkalyāṇe vartmanyavatārite naiṣkramyasatpathaṃ loke saṃvṛteṣvivāpāyadvāreṣu rājamārgīkṛteṣviva sugatimārgeṣu dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ tatkālaśiṣyeṇājitenānugamyamāno yogānukūlān parvatadarīnikuñjānanuvicacāra |
S03n224:47: atha sa bodhisattvaḥ sasaṃbhramāmreḍitapadaṃ svabhāvātiśayavyañjakaṃ karuṇābalasamāhitākṣaraṃ śiṣyamuvāca-vatsa vatsa!
S03n224:59: yādṛcchikī tasya hi lābhasaṃpat kāryātyayaḥ syācca tathā mamāyam ||21 ||
S03n224:61: nirātmake bhedini sārahīne duḥkhe kṛtadhne satatāśucau ca |
S03n224:62: dehe parasmāyupayujyamāne na prītimānyo na vicakṣaṇaḥ saḥ ||22 ||
S03n224:64: na cānyaduḥkhe sati me'sti saukhyaṃ satyāṃ ca śaktau kimupekṣakaḥ syām ||23 ||
S03n224:65: satyāṃ ca śaktau mama yadyupekṣā syādātatāyinyapi duḥkhamagne |
S03n224:66: kṛtveva pāpaṃ mama tena cittaṃ dahyeta kakṣaṃ mahatāgnineva ||24 ||
S03n224:68: saṃrakṣaṇaṃ putravadhācca mṛgyā mṛgyāḥ sakāśācca tadātmajānām ||25 ||
S03n224:76: kadā nu gātrairapi nāma kuryāṃ hitaṃ pareṣāmiti yaśca me'bhūt |
S03n224:79: na spardhayā naiva yaśo'bhilāṣānna svargalābhānna ca rājyahetoḥ |
S03n224:81: tathā mamānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca |
S03n224:82: hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ ||31 ||
S03n224:83: dṛṣṭe guṇe'nusmṛtimāgato vā spaṣṭaḥ kathāyogamupāgato vā |
S03n224:87: atha sā vyāghrī tena bodhisattvasya śarīranipātaśabdena samutthāpitakautūhalāmarṣā viramya svatanayavaiśasodyamāttato nayane vicikṣepa |
S03n224:88: dṛṣṭai va ca bodhisattvaśarīramudgataprāṇaṃ sahasābhisṛtya bhakṣayitumupacakrame |
S03n224:89: atha sa tasya śiṣyo māṃsamanāsādyaiva pratinivṛttaḥ kutropādhyāya iti vilokayaṃstadbodhisattvaśarīramudgataprāṇaṃ tayā vyāghrayuvatyā bhakṣyamāṇaṃ dardaśa |
S03n224:91: aho dayāsya vyasanāture jane svasaukhyanaiḥsaṅgyamaho mahātmanaḥ |
S03n224:92: aho prakarṣaṃ gamitā sthitiḥ satāmaho pareṣāṃ mṛditā yaśaḥśriyaḥ ||34 ||
S03n224:93: aho parākrāntamapetasādhvasaṃ guṇāśrayaṃ prema paraṃ pradarśitam |
S03n224:96: aho madīyā gamitā prakāśatāṃ khaṭuṅkatā vikramasaṃpadānayā ||36 ||
S03n224:97: anena nāthena sanāthatāṃ gataṃ na śocitavyaṃ khalu sāṃprataṃ jagat |
S03n224:103: tadevaṃ sarvasattveṣvakāraṇaparamavatsalasvabhāvaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtaḥ pūrvajanmasvapi sa bhagavāniti buddhe bhagavati paraḥ prasādaḥ kāryaḥ |
S03n224:107: evaṃ duṣkaraśatasamudānītatvāt karuṇāvarṇe'pi vācyamevaṃ svabhāvātiśayasya niṣpādikā parānugrahapravṛttihetuḥ karuṇeti |
